summary: A wolf Character to follow you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Update V3.1 Live.


Trapped [color=#ff0000]with no escape.
[/color][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wrHnRUp.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=3]Lyanna is a Lykaios explorer who loves delving into old Nordic ruins, dwarven cities, and even falmer caves from time to time however, exploring dangerous old ruins or falmer infested caves  in the pursuit of rare trinkets and items can be a hazardous hobby. One day whilst exploring Valthume, a Nordic ruin in the southeastern part of the reach, she found herself cut off from the entrance where she came in so now, with no where to go, she waits and hopes that someone will come along and open the entrance again. [/size]



What to expect:
[list=1]
[*][size=3]A Standalone Follower, requires no other mods to work.[/size]
[*][size=3]Uses Vanilla voice (Female Sultry).[/size]
[*][size=3]Wears Enchanted  Ancient Nord armor.[/size]
[*][size=3]Uses a Battleaxe called Bane of Mer and a bow called Bow of Ancient Blood.[/size]
[*][size=3]Compatible with CBBE/UNP/Vanilla[/size]
[*][u][b][size=3]Her Body is Vanilla and so long as you use the right version she should work with any UNP Variant or CBBE Variant Body.[/size][/b][/u]

[*][size=3]She prefers using two-handed weapons.[/size]
[*][size=3]Starts at level 10.[/size]
[*][size=3]Scales with player in level after 10 with no cap[/size]
[*][size=3]Will be grateful to you for opening Valthume for her to leave (Results may vary).[/size]
[*][size=3]Will most likely be naked when you find them.[/size]
[*][size=3]Found in Valthume in The Reach.[/size]
[*][size=3][u][b]Should Now Return To Valthume Properly.[/b][/u][/size]

[*][size=3]Can be married.[/size]
[*][size=3]I recommend you find her at levels 10 or above she may be too overpowered for low level play as she spawns at level 10 and has relatively strong enchants.[/size]
[/list]

[size=4]Installation
[/size]Install with NexusModManager or ModOrganizer or Manual install([u][i][b]Not recommended[/b][/i][/u]) by dragging and dropping to your data folder.

[size=4][b]Uninstall
[/b][size=3][size=2]Simply deactivate with NexusModManager or ModOrganizer.[/size]
[size=2]For manual uninstall delete the files included with this mod.[/size][/size]



[color=#8e7cc3][size=4][u][b]Feel free to upload your own images too mine are kind of shit. [/b][/u][/size][/color]



Marked adult because her base skin texture is nude and not vanilla but please correct me on this if that isn't right.
[/size][center]
Credits
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64466/?]Lykaios Race - Legacy Version [color=#ffffff]By KrittaKitty
[/color][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal [color=#ffffff]By Kalilies, Stealthic Khaos, and Shocky[/color][/url]
Dividedbythe9s for answering my retarded questions and giving me a couple tips.
And Bethesda for making Skyrim and the CK
Halo's Poser and Aether Suite for Screenshots.[/center]


[size=1][color=#666666]
[/color][/size]
author: FenrisHellhound AKA Kitexx

files.name: Lyanna Rose CBBE 2017
files.changelogHtml: Changed default outfit on both versions to her regular armor. Now like most vanilla followers she will only wear armor that is better than what she currently wears.

files.name: Lyanna Rose UNP 2017
files.changelogHtml: Changed default outfit on both versions to her regular armor. Now like most vanilla followers she will only wear armor that is better than what she currently wears.
